Detailed Description

TriangleStripArray defines an array of triangle strips.

void render ( int  pass,
int  index = 0 
) const [protected, virtual]

Render this object, for inner use.

Note: TriangleStripArray should be rendered only at second rendering pass(pass=2). In other cases, do nothing.
